ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] The boat to Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: I know. That s why I said get a port to DL and run to FM. :-) Just get sow and levitate-- maybe invis/camo and run like hell. That s what I do. :-) Oh yeah, I
ygData.messageBody:
I know. That's why I said get a port to DL and run to FM. :-)
Just get sow and levitate-- maybe invis/camo and run like hell. That's what
I do. :-)
Oh yeah, I forgot there were brutes in FM.. But there are some relatively
safe spots in DL near KC.
luv,
-Su



> The fix is in. They haven't gotten the boats running, and the
> shuttles just sit at the dock. However, on the dock is a temporary
> NPC who will translocate you to Timorous Deep. The one in TD will
> send you either way. I went to FV and set my bind point, but then
> returned to SK to finish my goals of gathering a full toolbox of
> Plains Pebbles and completing level 32. Dinged 33 last night, went to
> Rivervale to put my things in order, and put my toon to bed.
>
> Su, I am not sure that a level 33 hanging around KC in DL is a very
> survivable idea. I am more inclined to Frontier Mountains.
>
> I tend to approach the game in a semi-role-playing way. The game
> allows us to go boldly almost anywhere, as death is no very big deal.
> I prefer avoid game death, planning my moves with care and setting
> incremental goals. I think Frontier Mountains is a good step.
>
> I will keep in mind your advice, however. As I level up I will still
> need those Brute hides, and the KC hunting experience will be a good
> later step.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
>
>
